1. Once you have boarded and tour has been started you are not allowed to leave the tour in between of the pre-defined schedule. Only in case of emergency with permission of the assigned coordinator exception will be made.
 2. Drinking and smoking are strictly prohibited in the campus.
 3. Any misbehaviour will not be entertained and strict action will be taken against the defaulter.
 4. Vulgarity and obscenity will not be entertained in any form.
 5. Itinerary is subjected to change in case of undue circumstances.
 6. Lunch will not be provided by the organizers.
 7. Only day 1 pronites passes are paid. VIP entry will not be provided through MI Darshan.
 8. In case of any issue please contact the assigned coordinator.

1. MI Darshan will be a special event organised by our team to cater the newcomers.
 2. All distant travellers are welcomed.
 3. A group of students will be prefered over single entries.
 4. Students participating in different competitions in Mood Indigo are welcomed.
 5. Shortlisted participants and the waiting list participants will be personally informed.
Decision of the coordinator executing the tour will be final and binding on all
